properties.name: Colosseum
properties.description: Largest ancient amphitheater ever built, New Seven Wonders of the World

properties.name: Tre Cime di Lavaredo
properties.description: Iconic three-peaked Dolomite towers, UNESCO World Heritage Site

properties.name: Cinque Terre
properties.description: Five colorful villages clinging to Italian Riviera cliffs

properties.name: Venice
properties.description: Unique floating city of canals, bridges, and Gothic palaces

properties.name: Lago di Braies
properties.description: Turquoise alpine lake reflecting dramatic Dolomite peaks

properties.name: Amalfi Coast
properties.description: UNESCO coastal road with dramatic cliffs and colorful villages

properties.name: Positano
properties.description: Iconic pastel village cascading down cliffs to the Mediterranean

properties.name: Lake Como
properties.description: Glacier-fed Alpine lake surrounded by elegant villas

properties.name: Seceda
properties.description: Dramatic ridgeline viewpoint with panoramic Dolomite vistas

properties.name: Val d'Orcia
properties.description: UNESCO-listed rolling hills, cypress trees, and Renaissance farmhouses

properties.name: Vatican City & St. Peter's Basilica
properties.description: World's smallest country with Michelangelo's Sistine Chapel and largest church on Earth

properties.name: Leaning Tower of Pisa
properties.description: World's most famous architectural mistake, tilting 4 degrees in the Square of Miracles (UNESCO)

properties.name: Florence Cathedral (Duomo)
properties.description: Brunelleschi's iconic terracotta dome dominating the Florence skyline (UNESCO)

properties.name: Pompeii
properties.description: Ancient Roman city frozen in time by Vesuvius eruption of 79 AD (UNESCO)
